message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $14,000. I believe it holds significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is below its true worth. How about we meet halfway at $13,000? It's a win-win situation for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above $13,000. I'm willing to go up to $12,500, but no higher. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle.
